abstract: The agreement with Johnson and Johnson to settle three disputes involving heart stents is one of 17 that have been settled as Boston Scientific tries to clear up pending litigation.
snippet: The agreement with Johnson and Johnson to settle three disputes involving heart stents is one of 17 that have been settled as Boston Scientific tries to clear up pending litigation.
lead_paragraph: Boston Scientific said Monday that it would pay $1.725 billion to a unit of Johnson & Johnson to settle long-running disputes between the companies over patents for coronary stents.

headline.main: Boston Scientific to Pay $1.7 Billion to Settle Patent Suits
headline.print_headline: $1.7 Billion Settlement In Dispute Over Stents
